Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: My husband love this camera and the price! I gave a rating of five stars, because this camera takes great pictures. Would recommend it to family and friends.

ProductInfo.Features:
Amazingly slim at slightly over -inch thick. Fits practically anywhere so you can capture memories wherever you go.
Tracks faces and automatically focuses and optimizes exposure for sharp, brilliant portrait pictures.
With high ISO sensitivity and faster shutter speeds, Digital Image Stabilization lets you freeze the action to capture sharp, blur-free images even if you or your subject is moving.
Long-lasting economical shooting power so you'll never miss that important shot.
Capture and share your fondest memories in full motion using Movie with sound.
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-20 8MP Digital Camera (Silver) - REFURBISHED
